testcase.name: sf_kms on a RedHat OS should compile into a catalogue without dependency cycles
sf_kms on a RedHat OS should contain Class[sf_kms::config]
sf_kms on a RedHat OS should contain Class[sf_kms::install]
sf_kms on a RedHat OS should contain File[/var/lib/puppet/keys/public_key.pkcs7.pem] with ensure => "present", owner => "puppet", group => "root" and mode => "0440"
sf_kms on a RedHat OS should contain File[/var/lib/puppet/keys/private_key.pkcs7.pem] with owner => "puppet", group => "root" and mode => "0440"
